title: Feedback-Based Web Education for Enhancing Language Teaching Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Smartphone-based learning environment for non-degree-seeking adult learners, featuring an advanced language education specialization course

learning_goals: Learners can write improvement proposals reflecting feedback with 80% or higher accuracy for language education scenarios provided on web-based platforms.
Learners achieve a proficiency level of 4 or higher (on a 5-point scale) in peer assessments and automated grading systems after three repeated practice sessions through online exercises.
Learners demonstrate a navigation efficiency of 90% or higher in nonlinear navigation environments and can selectively utilize required learning materials.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
